desc: Best premium handcrafted ice cream in Malaysia. All ice cream are handcrafted with premium natural ingredients. There have 4 series of ice cream: Dairy, Non-diary,Sorbet and Reduced Sugar.Best selling flavours such as 68% Dark Chocolate, Pure Mint Chip, Uji Matcha & etc.We provide delivery within West Malaysia as well.

layout.text: First Ice Cream Delivery across West Malaysia
